name: Blueberry Dutch Baby
directions: Preheat oven to 450°F (232°C) and place rack in middle position.
Set a 9–10 inch cast iron skillet over low heat while preparing the batter.
Melt 2 tbsp (28 g) butter in a small skillet, then transfer to a blender.
Add milk, flour, eggs, sugar, vanilla, salt, and lemon zest; blend until smooth.
Increase skillet heat to medium-high and add remaining 2 tbsp (28 g) butter.
When melted, add blueberries and shake pan to coat evenly.
Immediately pour batter over blueberries and transfer skillet to oven.
Bake 15 minutes, until puffed and golden brown.
Remove from oven, dust with confectioners’ sugar, and serve warm with maple syrup.
